name: qsv-jsonl
description: Convert newline-delimited JSON (JSONL/NDJSON) to CSV. See `tojsonl` command to convert CSV to JSONL.

options.description: The number of rows per batch to load into memory, before running in parallel. Set to 0 to load all rows in one batch.
The delimiter to use when writing CSV data. Must be a single character.
Write output to <file> instead of stdout.
